name: Abductor! - Alien Invasion
description:
ABDUCTOR - ALIEN INVASION

Conquer the human race in this challenging arcade shooter! 
Wreak havoc through 10 worlds, destroy the enemy ships, defenses and buildings using your cannons, missiles, bombs and your superior alien intellect. Prioritize ground or air targets while avoiding enemy fire to succeed in your conquest. Collect ship upgrades and beam up humans for bonuses along the way.

Continuous play through time (Approx 1 hour). Or use a level password to proceed straight to that world!

CONTROLS

Playable with keyboard & mouse or X-Box compatible game pad. (Check the controls section of the game menu for game pad mapping)

W,A,S,D - Movement
LMB - Fire cannons
RMB - Fire missile
MMB - Drop energy bomb
Wheel - Adjust gun aim up/down
Abduction - Hover your craft over humans to beam them up

DEVELOPER NOTES

If you like the game or have any feedback or suggestions then please leave a comment below. We really appreciate it!

If you REALLY like the game then please consider leaving us a donation. Every little bit helps and we can continue to develop more great retro games :)
Thanks
